error_message: Please check that the IP ADDRESS and PORT are the same as
support_content: The app is updated thanks to user support. If you like the app, consider making a donation to help me keep it updated. Do you want to continue?
onboard_step1_content:
First, you need to download the desktop application from:

https://github.com/matias33pascual/macros-to-hd2-game-pc/releases/download/1.2.0/Macros.to.HD2.Game.PC-1.2.0.Setup.rar

Download this file to your computer.
onboard_step2_content: After downloading, extract and install the application on your computer. Follow the installation wizard instructions.
onboard_step3_content:
Open the installed program on your PC. You will see an IP ADDRESS and PORT displayed.

Enter these values in this mobile app and tap CONNECT to link your devices.

Now you're ready to use the app!
